item.title: Lionsgate to Develop Patrick Rothfuss Fantasy Series for Movies, TV and Video Games - IGN
item.description:
Lionsgate to Develop Patrick Rothfuss Fantasy Series for Movies, TV and Video Games - IGN

Movies, TV, and games could all be coming. Lionsgate has picked up the rights to Patrick Rothfuss' fantasy book series The Kingkiller Chronicle. According to The Hollywood Reporter, the deal includes the simultaneous development of movies, television series, and video games. Lionsgate saw off interest from the likes of Warner Bros.
